thread.title: BRIEF-GasLog Partners Announces To Buy GasLog Gibraltar For $207 Mln and Repayment of Intercompany Loan

title: BRIEF-GasLog Partners Announces To Buy GasLog Gibraltar For $207 Mln and Repayment of Intercompany Loan

organizations.name: repayment of intercompany loan reuters staff

text: March 21, 2018 / 11:16 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-GasLog Partners Announces To Buy GasLog Gibraltar For $207 Mln and Repayment of Intercompany Loan Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 21 (Reuters) - Gaslog Ltd: * GASLOG PARTNERS LP ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF GASLOG GIBRALTAR FOR $207 MILLION AND REPAYMENT OF INTERCOMPANY LOAN * GASLOG - ‍PARTNERSHIP BELIEVES ACQUISITION WILL BE IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO DISTRIBUTABLE CASH FLOW PER UNIT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
